                  String user,
                  String pass)
                    throws IOException
        Opening a connection to the FTP server.
        Parameters:
        svr - The server name. If null is passed, the local machine is used.
        user - The user name.
        pass - The user password.
        Throws:
        IOException - Error on connection.
